scripts.setup:env: npm install && cd servers/fastapi && uv sync && cd ../../servers/nextjs && npm install
scripts.install:pyinstaller: cd servers/fastapi && echo 'pyinstaller already in dependencies'
scripts.build:vectorstore: cd servers/fastapi && uv run python build_vectorstore.py
scripts.build:nextjs: rm -rf resources/nextjs && cd servers/nextjs && cross-env BUILD_TARGET=electron npm run build && cp -r .next-build ../../resources/nextjs && cp -r app/presentation-templates ../../resources/nextjs/presentation-templates
scripts.build:fastapi: rm -rf resources/fastapi && npm run build:vectorstore && cd servers/fastapi && uv run python -m PyInstaller --distpath ../../resources server.spec
scripts.build:all: npm run clean:build && npm run setup:env && npm run build:ts && npm run install:pyinstaller && npm run build:nextjs && npm run build:fastapi && npm run build:electron
scripts.clean:build: rm -rf resources/nextjs && rm -rf resources/fastapi && rm -rf app_dist
